voiceMove.title: Moved
voiceMove.description: {user} was moved from the {channel_old} voice channel to the {channel_new} voice channel

stageEnded.title: Stage Ended
stageEnded.description: The stage in {channel} was ended by {executor}

stageUpdated.title: Stage Updated
stageUpdated.description: The stage in {channel} was updated by {executor}

stageSpeakerAdd.description: {user} became a speaker in the {channel} stage channel
stageSpeakerAdd.description_inviteAccepted: {user} accepted the invite to become a speaker in the {channel} stage channel
stageSpeakerAdd.title: New Stage Speaker

voiceSwitch.description: {user} moved from the {channel_old} voice channel to the {channel_new} voice channel
voiceSwitch.title: Changed Channel

streamStop.description: {user} stopped streaming in the {channel} voice channel
streamStop.title: Stream Ended

stageSpeakerInvited.description: {user} was invited to speak in the {channel} stage channel
stageSpeakerInvited.title: Speaker Invited

videoStart.description: {user} started their video in the {channel} voice channel
videoStart.title: Video Started

streamStart.title: Stream Started
streamStart.description: {user} started streaming in the {channel} voice channel

videoStop.title: Video Stopped
videoStop.description: {user} stopped their video in the {channel} voice channel

stageSpeakerRemove.description: {user} is no longer a speaker in the {channel} stage channel
stageSpeakerRemove.title: Stopped Speaking
